item.bikesarepain.bicycle.tooltip.repair: Repair with a wrench and nuts.
bikesarepain.jserialcomm.timeout: Lost connection to the serial port. Please run /bikes open <port> to try again.
bikesarepain.jserialcomm.port_not_availa: The chosen port is not available. Manually run /bikes open <port> to try again.
config.bikesarepain.visuals.name: Visuals
config.bikesarepain.visuals.tooltip: Visual settings for Bikes Are Pain.
config.bikesarepain.visuals.pedometer.to: Configuration for the visuals aspects of the pedometer item.
config.bikesarepain.visuals.pedometer.im: Shows imperial units for any bike you are riding.
config.bikesarepain.serial.name: Serial
config.bikesarepain.serial.tooltip: Settings for connecting with an arduino. Used for reading data from a fitness bike.
config.bikesarepain.serial.link.name: Link
config.bikesarepain.serial.link.tooltip: Parameters that are used for reading data from the serial port.
config.bikesarepain.serial.link.autoconn: Automatically tries to connect to the serial port when entering the world or a server.
Shows a message when the port chosen isn't available while using "Connect on Join".
config.bikesarepain.serial.link.port.too: The port that the arduino is connected to.
config.bikesarepain.serial.link.baudrate: The speed of the data transfer. Must match the arduino's baud rate.
config.bikesarepain.serial.scale.name: Units Scale
config.bikesarepain.serial.scale.tooltip: Used to scale the speed and wheel sizes readings before applying them. Can be set more easily with "/bikes scale set"
config.bikesarepain.serial.scale.wheel.t: This scales the size of the real wheel to the in-game wheel. This only affects the model visually.
config.bikesarepain.serial.scale.speed.t: The speed readings from the arduino are multiplied by this value. This is used to make the biking 'feel' faster or slower.
